con:testCase.name: EmpCreatesBMPeriodicSOWithBlockedForDebitNewCore
con:testCase.con:description:
Standing Order - Balance Above - BM Payment
Validated to Active Check

con:request.name: SO Auth
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" value="${Properties#Value2}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="be8bb5d0-b189-42d7-bdf5-389c6611364c"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#AgreementId}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>4201</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>941171877</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>941171877</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>941171877</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#DebitAccountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>941171877</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>NOK</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>999999</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>999999</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>0</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>1</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>941171877</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>NOK</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>1</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>D</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SOCreateBMPeriodicWithDebitBlocked
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn2="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_5">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationAPP}</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.2</wsc:ip>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#Value}"/>\r <wsc:item key="SelfService" value="${Properties#Value1}"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#Value2}"/>\r <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="be8bb5d0-b189-42d7-bdf5-389c6611364c"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r <urn:standingOrder>\r <urn1:recurrence>DAILY</urn1:recurrence>\r <urn1:dueDates>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate>\r </urn1:dueDates>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>AFTER</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>\r <urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_5">\r <urn4:identification xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">42244002638</urn4:identification>\r <urn4:currency xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">NOK</urn4:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn1:transaction>\r <urn2:amount>\r <urn3:instructedAmount currency="NOK" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">\r <urn3:amount>160</urn3:amount>\r </urn3:instructedAmount>\r </urn2:amount>\r <urn2:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn2:chargeBearer>\r <urn2:creditorAgent>\r <urn3:bic xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">SPTRNO22XXX</urn3:bic>\r <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">\r <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode>\r <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName>\r <urn3:countrySubDivision>testing</urn3:countrySubDivision>\r <urn3:country>NO</urn3:country>\r </urn3:postalAddress>\r </urn2:creditorAgent>\r <urn2:creditor>\r <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name>\r <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">\r <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode>\r <urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName>\r <urn3:countrySubDivision>test</urn3:countrySubDivision>\r <urn3:country>NO</urn3:country>\r </urn3:postalAddress>\r </urn2:creditor>\r <urn2:creditorAccount>\r <urn3:identification xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">42244002611</urn3:identification>\r <urn3:currency xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">NOK</urn3:currency>\r </urn2:creditorAccount>\r <urn2:ultimateCreditor>\r <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name>\r </urn2:ultimateCreditor>\r </urn1:transaction>\r <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType>\r </urn:standingOrder>\r </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
